allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys,json try: d=json.load\(sys.stdin\) r=d[''quoteSummary''][''result''][0] p=r.get\(''price'',{}\) s=r.get\(''summaryDetail'',{}\) k=r.get\(''defaultKeyStatistics'',{}\) f=r.get\(''financialData'',\) print\(''Price:'', p.get\(''regularMarketPrice'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''Currency:'', p.get\(''currency'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''MarketCap:'', p.get\(''marketCap'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''SharesOut:'', k.get\(''sharesOutstanding'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''PB:'', k.get\(''priceToBook'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''DivYield:'', s.get\(''dividendYield'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''TrailingPE:'', s.get\(''trailingPE'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''BookValue:'', k.get\(''bookValue'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''TotalCash:'', f.get\(''totalCash'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''TotalDebt:'', f.get\(''totalDebt'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''FCF:'', f.get\(''freeCashflow'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''OpCF:'', f.get\(''operatingCashflow'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''Revenue:'', f.get\(''totalRevenue'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) print\(''NetIncome:'', f.get\(''netIncomeToCommon'',{}\).get\(''raw'',''N/A''\)\) except Exception as e: print\(''Error:'',e\) ")
